Welcome to mist.io’s documentation!¶

Version:1.0.0
Author:Mist.io Inc
Source:https://github.com/mistio/mist.io
License:GNU AGPL v3
Keywords:web cloud mobile libcloud pyramid amazon rackspace openstack linode

Mist.io helps you manage and monitor servers across clouds from anywhere, using any device that can access the web. Check out the freemium service at mist.io.
